title: A Running Example (3/4)

definitions.Automatic Curriculum: A system that provides a structured learning path for a player in a game.
definitions.Iterative Prompting Mechanism: A process that guides a player through a series of tasks and challenges.
definitions.Skill Library: A collection of skills or actions that a player can perform in a game.

summary: The slide presents a running example of an automatic curriculum and iterative prompting mechanism in a game. It includes a diagram showing the process of mining wood, crafting a sword, and combat with a zombie. The slide also lists the skills available in the skill library.
